title: Arial? But slightly rounded
content:
I have to recreate this logo. Just wondering if this is an actual typeface or has someone messed with Arial Bold? The corners all seem slightly rounded...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033552im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/driver_4284.gif)

 [‹ Looking for a typeface similiar to Hoefler Titling Light Swash](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033552/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39625 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help identifying the typeface used in the "Coroflot" logo. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033552/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39655 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Maverick

comments.content: “normal” Arial with an added stroke, round corners and joins (in Illustrator).
D’oh! Why didn’t I think of that? Thank you very much!
